idea: MajjaVoice is an Audio Company (PODCAST). It will reach out to the core Indian in their respective languages.

idea:
Prowess Consultany is an emerging HR and manpower solution provider. The venture was incorporated by Ms. Kirti Shinde in 2017. She laid the foundation stone of the company with a sole aim to become a preferred talent acquisition partner of the companies. The company is based in Mumbai (Maharashtra, India) and we hold accreditation to render services like:

Manpower Recruitment Services

Domestic Placement Services

Career Consultancy Services

HR Consultancy Services

Temporary Staffing

Campus Placement
name: Prowess Consultancy

idea: Imagine showing someone around a portfolio of homes from the comfort of your office, or guiding a client through a new design where they could experience the space, light and feel of a room – Virtual and augmented reality offers experiences like no other, allowing people to conceptualise and understand what’s difficult to imagine from a picture or detailed description. We at Visuaan TechLabs offers professionals throughout the real estate industry an easy, quick and affordable way to use VR to enhance their customers’ experience and maximise the opportunities to explain concepts and spaces to support the sales process.
name: Visuan TechLabs
